医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
新药VIP36在治疗疼痛而没有有害副作用的情况下显示出希望由国立卫生研究院（NIH）资助的研究团队开发了一种药物，显示出治疗急性和慢性疼痛的希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/new-drug-vip36-shows-promise-promise-in-worteating-pain-without-without-without-without-side-fefts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/new-drug-vip36-shows-promise-promise-in-woreating-pain-without-without-without-without-side-fellefts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a6f7c59-f474-4d78-bd8c-ba66e01d05f1 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 12:40:40 -0500 New drug VIP36 shows promise in treating pain without harmful side effects
残疾患者面临不尊重医疗保健提供者根据宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院的新研究，残疾患者不太可能对医护人员进行尊重的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/patients-with-disabilities-face-dispect-from-health-health-care-providers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/patients-with-disabilities-face-face-dispect-from-health-health-care-providers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B582397C-59A1-469B-B185-195EA55D00F8 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 12:32:35 -0500 Patients with disabilities face disrespect from health care providers
研究揭露了电子烟支持戒烟的信念赫伯特·沃特海姆公共卫生和人类长寿科学学院和加利福尼亚大学圣地亚哥分校的摩尔癌中心的研究人员发现，在美国的吸烟者中，电子烟的使用不会增加戒烟，并且实际上与减少烟草的戒烟有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/research-debunks-belief-that-e-cigarettes-support-support-smoking-cessation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/research-debunks-belief-that-e-cigarettes-support-support-smoking-cessation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f401A3C-F8F6-4591-9EE7-11403852A52E Wed, 05 Mar 2025 12:21:10 -0500 Research debunks belief that e-cigarettes support smoking cessation
贝克曼·库尔特（Beckman Coulter）生命科学和稀有生物科学AB合作伙伴关系将分子研究带来流式细胞术稀有生物科学的创新SuperRCA技术增强了流式细胞术，扩大肿瘤学研究可能性并改善突变检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/beckman-coulter-life-sciences-and-and-rarity-bioscience-bioscience-ab-partnership-brings-brings-molecular-molecular-research-to to to-flow-cytometry.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/beckman-coulter-life-sciences-and-and-rarity-bioscience-bioscience-ab-partnership-brings-brings-molecular-molecular-crearch-to to-flow-cytometry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AF4A2EEA-8EB0-4B3A-8B92-BA31870D9659 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 12:16:00 -0500 Beckman Coulter Life Sciences and Rarity Bioscience AB Partnership Brings Molecular Research to Flow Cytometry
tau蛋白清除的新方法为阿尔茨海默氏症的治疗带来了希望在一项涉及小鼠和实验室种植的人类“迷你脑”的研究中，USC干细胞科学家发现了一种释放有毒tau蛋白细胞的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/new-appleact-to-tau-protein-cleotein-clearance-verners-hope-for-alzheimers-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/new-pablecreach-to-tau-protein-cleotein-clearance-verners-hope-for-alzheimers-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bff7b8ba-0201-4FAA-9179-6FBB8E156BE7 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 12:13:06 -0500 New approach to tau protein clearance offers hope for Alzheimer's treatment
研究将环境化学暴露与更快的生物衰老联系起来一份新的研究论文于2025年2月11日发表在《衰老》（老化）中，第17卷，第2期，标题为“全国卫生和营养检查中的环境化学暴露与表观遗传学衰老研究”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/study-links-environmental-chemical-chemical-ceposures-to--faster-biological-agical-appx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/study-links-environmental-chemical-chemical-ceposures-to-faster-biological-agical-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fdc89e09-5d91-42f2-ac3f-e2899c6192c9 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 12:06:09 -0500 Study links environmental chemical exposures to faster biological aging
探索室内区域在神经再生中的作用，神经退行性疾病最近对脑室下区（SVZ）进行了探索，强调了其在神经再生，神经退行性疾病和多形胶质母细胞瘤（GBM）中的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/Exploring-the-ploring-the-the-phore-of-subescultricular-zone-in-neural-nearer-nearer-neurer-neurecer-neurodegenerative-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/Exploring-the-the-the-prole-of-subscultricular-zone-zone-in-neural-nearer-nearer-neurencor-neurodegenerative-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9299b49e-d584-4cc7-a698-67e1faa7e93e Wed, 05 Mar 2025 12:00:55 -0500 Exploring the role of subventricular zone in neural regeneration, neurodegenerative diseases
棕色的脂肪发现可能会彻底改变衰老和运动表现罗格斯健康研究人员已经发现了有关棕色脂肪的发现，该脂肪可能为帮助人们随着年龄的增长而保持身体健康的新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/brown-fat-discovery-could-revolution-could-revolutions-gaging-aging-ang--ang----------and-cercise-performance-performance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/brown-fat-discovery-could-revolution-could-revolutions-gage-anging-ang--ang-and-cercise-performance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba989cf1-aa6f-4f-4f0a-9C7C-6B8C3D2FAAD1 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 11:55:51 -0500 Brown fat discovery could revolutionize aging and exercise performance
KAIST团队为基于AI的可穿戴血压传感器开发框架由Keon Jae Lee教授领导的KAIST研究团队为基于AI的可穿戴血压传感器提出了创新的理论框架和研究策略，为连续和非侵入性心血管监测铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/kaist-team-develops-framework-framework-framework-for-ai-基于wearable-wearable-blood-pressure-pressure-sensors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/kaist-team-develops-framework-framework-framework-for-ai- wearable-wearable-blood-pressure-pressure-sensors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4362b1ef-4787-4876-4876-8D8B-DEE737DDE588 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 11:42:42 -0500 KAIST team develops framework for AI-based wearable blood pressure sensors
调查显示，有3100万美国人借了数十亿美元来支付医疗保健费用根据West Health and Gallup的一项新调查，去年有超过3,100万美国人（12％）的报告去年需要借用约740亿美元的医疗保健费用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/survey-reveals-31-mills-millions-- americans借用boryed-boryed-bory-to-to-to-to-for-for-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/survey-reveals-31-mills-million--mericans obered-boryed-boryed-boardions-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-for-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28c1c238-b8c2-4cd0-9454-3454-3fec27701b98 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 11:34:42 -0500 Survey reveals 31 million Americans borrowed billions to pay for healthcare
